item.title: ã€ŠKolors: Unet is enough for diffusionã€‹
item.description: Table of Contents ğŸ“– Model Introduction ğŸ“Š Evaluation Performance ğŸ¥‡ğŸ¥‡ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ ğŸ¥ Visualization ğŸ› ï¸ Quick Start ğŸ“œ License and Citation ğŸ“– Model Introduction We have open-sourced the Kolors large model, which is a large-scale text-to-image generation model based on latent diffusion. The current open-source model has 2.7 billion parameters. Kolors is trained on billions of text-image pairs and demonstrates significant advantages in visual quality, complex semantic understanding, and even text generation (Chinese and English characters) compared to both open-source and closed-source models.
